text: John OC Ashby was a Colonel in the Virginia Militia. During the French and Indian war there was a siege at present day Fort Ashby, West Virginia. In 1756 Colonel John 'OC' Ashby was out of the fort at that location and was attacked by Indians and made a remarkable escape to the fort. The fort was named for him Fort Ashby Category:Mineral County, West Virginia Category:People from Virginia Category:1646 births Category:1693 deaths
